message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This investment is expected to yield substantial returns and provide long-term benefits. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable addition to your endeavors.

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe it's a fair price considering the features and capabilities you mentioned. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to stay within my budget.
